message.content:
cs.LG, cs.CV, cs.DS, cs.AI, cs.ST

Reasoning: 
1. cs.LG (Machine Learning): The paper proposes sparse variants of a widely used machine learning classifier, the nearest-centroid classifier. 
2. cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition): The proposed sparse classifiers can be applied to feature selection in image classification tasks. 
3. cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms): The paper discusses the computational cost of the proposed sparse classifiers and their efficiency in feature selection. 
4. cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence): The proposed sparse classifiers can be applied to various AI tasks, such as classification and prediction. 
5. cs.ST (Statistics): The paper discusses the statistical properties of the proposed sparse classifiers and their performance compared to state-of-the-art feature selection techniques.
